resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104571</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104571</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204474</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Basketball: How to shoot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basketball: Wie man schießt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Basket-ball : Comment tirer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Basketball: Como disparar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pallacanestro: Come sparare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλαθοσφαίριση: Πώς να πυροβολήσει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Baloncesto: Cómo tirar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will give students the ability to succeed at one of the most important skills of basketball. This will be interesting, easy, and fun to learn.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion gibt Kursteilnehmern die Fähigkeit,
bei einer der wichtigsten Fähigkeiten des Basketballs zu folgen. 
Dieses ist interessant, einfach und der Spaß zum zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon donnera à des étudiants la 
capacité de réussir à une des qualifications les plus importantes 
du basket-ball. Ce sera intéressant, facile, et amusement à 
apprendre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição dará a estudantes a abilidade de 
suceder em uma das habilidades as mais importantes do basketball. 
Este será interessante, fácil, e divertimento a aprender.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione darà ad allievi la capacità di 
riuscire ad una delle abilità più importanti di pallacanestro. 
Ciò sarà interessante, facile e divertimento da imparare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα δώσει στους σπουδαστές τη 
δυνατότητα να πετύχει σε μια από τις σημαντικότερες δεξιότητες 
της καλαθοσφαίρισης. Αυτό θα είναι ενδιαφέρον, εύκολο, και 
διασκέδαση που μαθαίνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección dará a estudiantes la capacidad de 
tener éxito a la una de las habilidades más importantes del 
baloncesto. Ésta será interesante, fácil, y diversión a 
aprender.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:RANDY YATES
FN:RANDY YATES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>

            <entry>1770204474</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104571</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/basketball-how-to-shoot</uri>

  </manifestation>
